bundle.shortDescription: A framework for enhancing CLIs with graphics
bundle.longDescription: Kui takes your normal kubectl command line requests and responds with graphics. Instead of ASCII tables, you are presented with sortable ones. Instead of copying and pasting long auto-generated resource names, in Kui you just click.
